# The `OMPAssume.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file provides helper functions and classes to deal with OpenMP assumptions, e.g., as used by <code>&#91;begin/end&#93; assumes</code> and <code>assume</code>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file provides helper functions and classes to deal with OpenMP assumptions, e.g., as used by <code>&#91;begin/end&#93; assumes</code> and <code>assume</code>.
